summary: A custom website for a local business that sells unique handmade items. The site features a product page, a contact form, and I even created the brand. To reach a wider audience, I made the site responsive for mobile devices.
title: busy little bat sewing

summary: A color palette generator that tells users the hex, rgb, and hsl colors of images.. so if you want to know the colors an image is using, use this tool! I tried making the app as user-friendly as possible.
title: pixipalette

summary: A grocery list app that allows users to add, remove, and edit items. I used react to build this and it features a simple and intuitive interface.
title: grocery list

summary: My version of an e-commerce product page that features a product image, title, price, and description. I used the fake store API to populate the product data.
title: e-commerce product page

summary: If you're like me and have a hard time creating passwords, PassCraft is for you! It generates random passwords based on user input.
title: passcraft

summary: Custom blog page where you can add, edit, and remove posts. It uses localStorage to save the posts, so they persist even after refreshing the page.
title: think.flow
